DOC.brief_summary: This study ass safety tolerability RotaTeq™ ( V260 ) healthy Chinese population . Approximately 144 participant enrol equally stratify three age cohort , Cohort I age 19-47 year , Cohort II age 2-6 year , Cohort III age 6-12 week . Randomization ratio 1:1 cohort . The study conduct sequentially , participant Cohort I Cohort II receive 1 dose , participant Cohort III receive 3 dos RotaTeq™/placebo . The primary investigator Ethics Review Committee review blind safety data make decision base best clinical judgment move study forward cohorts . Duration entire study approximately 6-9 month .
